ACCOUNT.PRIVACY_NOTE: Privacy: Read our <policyLink>Privacy Policy</policyLink>, or change your settings in our <hubLink>Privacy Hub</hubLink>.

DANGER_ZONE.TITLE: Danger Zone
DANGER_ZONE.KEYWORDS: sync log delete account reset walkthrough progress reset onboarding advanced account settings

NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Mobile Streak Notifications
NOTIFICATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Send mobile push reminders about your daily flashcard streak. Reminders come at 6pm each day, in your local timezone.

ENABLE.TITLE: Enable AI Features
ENABLE.DESCRIPTION: Use AI-based autocompletion, grading, and flashcards generation. Snippets of your notes will be sent to OpenAI when you use many AI features. Find OpenAI's privacy policy at https://openai.com/policies/privacy-policy.

OPENAI_KEY.TITLE: OpenAI API Key
OPENAI_KEY.DESCRIPTION: If you find yourself exceeding your monthly quota of AI requests, you can sign up for an API key at https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys and enter it here to pay for your own usage. Note that this is a beta feature and could be removed at any time.

MAXIMUM_DAILY_TARGET.TITLE: Maximum Daily Target
MAXIMUM_DAILY_TARGET.DESCRIPTION: Cap the number of flashcards RemNote will ask you to practice to meet your daily target at this value.

DAILY_TARGET.TODAYS_TARGET_EXPLANATION: RemNote tries to set your daily target so that, if you reach the target every day, you'll complete all cards due for review during the next 7 days. However, the daily target will never be more than the maximum set above.

RESET_ALL.TITLE: Reset All Flashcard Settings to Defaults
RESET_ALL.DESCRIPTION: Reset all flashcard settings to their default values.
RESET_ALL.CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to reset all flashcard settings to their default values?

NEW_CARDS_PER_DAY.TITLE: Max New Cards Per Day
NEW_CARDS_PER_DAY.DESCRIPTION: Include at most this many newly created flashcards in your flashcard queue each day. This way, new cards will enter your queue at a steady daily rate, rather than in a giant batch.

STALE_CARDS_PER_DAY.TITLE: Max Stale Cards Per Day
STALE_CARDS_PER_DAY.DESCRIPTION: Reintroduce at most this many stale flashcards into your flashcard queue each day. Stale cards are ones which are temporarily withheld from the queue because you haven't studied them in a long time and relearning them all at once would be exhausting.

LEECH_THRESHOLD.TITLE: Leech Threshold
LEECH_THRESHOLD.DESCRIPTION: Leeches are difficult cards that you keep learning and then forgetting again. If you press “forgot” on a card more times than this, we'll warn you so you can figure out why you're struggling and fix the problem. Set this to higher values to see the leech warning less often.

LEARN_AHEAD_LIMIT.TITLE: Learn Ahead Limit
LEARN_AHEAD_LIMIT.DESCRIPTION: When you reach the end of your queue, RemNote will show you cards up to this many minutes before they are due, so that you don't end up with cards due again immediately after finishing your queue.

AUTOPLAY_MEDIA.TITLE: Autoplay Media
AUTOPLAY_MEDIA.DESCRIPTION: When showing a flashcard, automatically play any audio or video on it.

TYPE_ANSWER.TITLE: Type Answer
TYPE_ANSWER.DESCRIPTION: Show a text box on the front of each flashcard and compare what you type to the answer on the back of the card.

SIMPLIFIED_FLASHCARD_BUTTONS.TITLE: Simplified Flashcard Buttons
SIMPLIFIED_FLASHCARD_BUTTONS.DESCRIPTION: Show only the “Forgot” and “Recalled with effort” response buttons when studying flashcards, instead of all five options.

NEXT_DAY_STARTS_AT.TITLE: Next Day Starts At
NEXT_DAY_STARTS_AT.DESCRIPTION: New cards appear in your queue each day at this time.

SHOW_NEXT_REVIEW_TIMES.TITLE: Show Next Review Times
SHOW_NEXT_REVIEW_TIMES.DESCRIPTION: Show the amount of time until the next review on each answer button.

DOCUMENT_CLUSTERS.TITLE: Document Clusters
DOCUMENT_CLUSTERS.DESCRIPTION: Prefer to practice Rems from connected documents together.

REFERENCE_CLUSTERS.TITLE: Reference Clusters
REFERENCE_CLUSTERS.DESCRIPTION: Prefer to practice Rems that reference each other together.

TAG_CLUSTERS.TITLE: Tag Clusters
TAG_CLUSTERS.DESCRIPTION: Prefer to practice Rems with the same tag together.

HIERARCHY_CLUSTERS.TITLE: Hierarchy Clusters
HIERARCHY_CLUSTERS.DESCRIPTION: Prefer to practice Rems related to each other hierarchically together.

MAXIMUM_FLASHCARD_RESPONSE_TIME.TITLE: Maximum Flashcard Response Time
MAXIMUM_FLASHCARD_RESPONSE_TIME.DESCRIPTION: If you take longer to answer a flashcard than this (in seconds), leave the rest of the time out of your statistics.

DESCRIPTION.PC: When you press Enter in the middle of a Rem, create a line break within that Rem, and instead use Alt+Enter to break the text into two separate Rems. (By default, Shift+Enter and Enter alone, respectively, serve these functions.)
DESCRIPTION.MAC: When you press Return in the middle of a Rem, create a line break within that Rem, and instead use Opt+Return to break the text into two separate Rems. (By default, Shift+Return and Return alone, respectively, serve these functions.)

ENTER_TO_OUTDENT.TITLE: Press Enter to Outdent
ENTER_TO_OUTDENT.LABEL: When pressing Enter on a Rem with no content that is not at the top level of the document, outdent one level. (If disabled, stay at the same level and leave an empty Rem.)

DOUBLE_SLASH_FOR_COMMAND_MENU.TITLE: Double Slash For Command Menu
DOUBLE_SLASH_FOR_COMMAND_MENU.DESCRIPTION: Type // instead of / to trigger commands while editing Rems.

DEFAULT_TO_LEGACY_KEYBOARD_SHORTCUTS.TITLE: Default To Legacy Keyboard Shortcuts
DEFAULT_TO_LEGACY_KEYBOARD_SHORTCUTS.DESCRIPTION: Default to the legacy keyboard shortcuts (before the August 2020 update).

ENABLE_SPELLCHECK.TITLE: Enable Spellcheck
ENABLE_SPELLCHECK.DESCRIPTION: Check the currently focused Rem for typos. Spellcheck uses the language(s) selected in your browser or operating system.

DESCRIPTION.PC: When creating a Rem by pressing Ctrl+Enter in a search, capitalize its name.
DESCRIPTION.MAC: When creating a Rem by pressing Cmd+Return in a search, capitalize its name.

DESCRIPTION.PC: When creating a Rem by pressing Ctrl+Enter in a search, make it into a Concept.
DESCRIPTION.MAC: When creating a Rem by pressing Cmd+Return in a search, make it into a Concept.

DESCRIPTION.PC: When creating a Rem by pressing Ctrl+Enter in a search, tag it with “Stub.”
DESCRIPTION.MAC: When creating a Rem by pressing Cmd+Return in a search, tag it with “Stub.”

INSERT_EMOJIS_AS_REFERENCES.TITLE: Insert Emoji As References
INSERT_EMOJIS_AS_REFERENCES.DESCRIPTION: When searching with %% and selecting an emoji, it will be inserted as a reference.

DATE_FORMATTING.TITLE: Date Formatting
DATE_FORMATTING.DESCRIPTION: Format Daily Document titles and dates inserted with /date like this.

DATE_FORMATTING_CUSTOM.TITLE: Custom Date Formatting
DATE_FORMATTING_CUSTOM.DESCRIPTION: Format your date as you wish using the provided options.

TIME_FORMATTING.TITLE: Time Formatting
TIME_FORMATTING.DESCRIPTION: Format times inserted with /time like this.

WEEK_STARTS_ON_MONDAY.TITLE: Week Starts on Monday
WEEK_STARTS_ON_MONDAY.DESCRIPTION: When selecting dates from a date picker, start each row in the calendar with Monday rather than Sunday.

PLANS.TITLE: Plans
PLANS.KEYWORDS: invite friends plan change subscription earn credits free remnote send tweet email choose plan life-long learning pro feature breakdown pricing options

EARN_CREDIT.TITLE: Earn Credits
EARN_CREDIT.KEYWORDS: invite friends earn credit plan change subscription earn credits free remnote send tweet email choose plan life-long learning pro feature breakdown pricing options
EARN_CREDIT.INVITE_FRIENDS_EARN_CREDIT: Invite your friends to earn credit! You'll receive <0>{{monthlyPrice}}</0> in RemNote credit when the person you invite signs up for a RemNote account, and they'll also get <0>{{monthlyPrice}}</0> credit to get started.
EARN_CREDIT.CREDIT_BALANCE_TEXT:
You have {{userCredit}} credit remaining and have earned {{userCreditEarned}} credit in total. {{months}} remaining month or months of RemNote Pro for free.

Subscribe to Pro to start using your credit! You won't be charged until your credit runs out.
EARN_CREDIT.TOAST_SUBSCRIBE: Your credits will be applied automatically when you subscribe to RemNote Pro. Choose a plan below to get started!
EARN_CREDIT.TOAST_RENEW: Your credits will be applied automatically when your current subscription renews.
EARN_CREDIT.CREATE_ACCOUNT: Create an account to invite friends
EARN_CREDIT.FRIEND_ALREADY_ON_REMNOTE: Your friend is already on RemNote
EARN_CREDIT.INVITE_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
EARN_CREDIT.VERIFY_EMAIL: To invite someone, verify your email first.

FULL_WIDTH.TITLE: Full Width
FULL_WIDTH.LABEL: Expand documents to use the full width of the screen.

SIMPLIFIED_UI.TITLE: Simplified UI
SIMPLIFIED_UI.LABEL: Simplify the UI and hide advanced features.

IN_APP_SUGGESTIONS.TITLE: Top-of-Document Onboarding Tips
IN_APP_SUGGESTIONS.LABEL: Show tips on RemNote features you could try at the top of your document.

LEFT_SIDEBAR_TUTORIALS.TITLE: In-App Tutorials
LEFT_SIDEBAR_TUTORIALS.LABEL: Show tutorials on RemNote features you're currently using in the corner of the screen.
LEFT_SIDEBAR_TUTORIALS.KEYWORDS: in app left sidebar tutorials tooltips help support learn tutorial

ONBOARDING_TIPS_SHORTCUTS.TITLE: Keyboard Shortcut Tips
ONBOARDING_TIPS_SHORTCUTS.LABEL: Show tips on keyboard shortcuts you're currently using in the corner of the screen.

COMMUNITY_DOCUMENT_SEARCH_LANGUAGE.TITLE: Shared Flashcards Search Language
COMMUNITY_DOCUMENT_SEARCH_LANGUAGE.KEYWORDS: language community documents search flashcards share shared download find

SINGLE_CLICK_REFERENCES_TO_OPEN.TITLE: Single-Click References to Open
SINGLE_CLICK_REFERENCES_TO_OPEN.LABEL: When you click or tap on a Reference, immediately go to its target, rather than opening the reference menu. (You can always show the reference menu by right-clicking.)

SCALE_COLLAPSED_REM_BULLETS.TITLE: Scale Collapsed Rem Bullets
SCALE_COLLAPSED_REM_BULLETS.LABEL: When a Rem is collapsed, make the ring around its bullet larger or smaller based on its total number of descendants.

SMOOTHLY_ANIMATE_THE_EDITOR.TITLE: Smoothly Animate The Editor
SMOOTHLY_ANIMATE_THE_EDITOR.LABEL: Smoothly animate adding and deleting Rems in the editor.

PREVIEW_REM_ON_HOVER.TITLE: Preview References on Hover
PREVIEW_REM_ON_HOVER.LABEL: When you hover over a Reference, show a preview of its contents.

ENABLE_ZOOM_INTO_BULLET.TITLE: Enable Zooming into Bullet
ENABLE_ZOOM_INTO_BULLET.LABEL: When you click on the bullet pointer, show the rem as a full page

DOCUMENT_STATUSES.TITLE: Document Statuses
DOCUMENT_STATUSES.LABEL: Organize documents into Draft, Finished, and Pinned categories.

SIDEBAR.PRIVACY_NOTE: Privacy: Read our <policyLink>Privacy Policy</policyLink>, or change your settings in our <hubLink>Privacy Hub</hubLink>.

NOTIFICATIONS.ENABLE_PUSH_LABEL: Receive notifications directly to your device
NOTIFICATIONS.ENABLE_DUE_CARDS_LABEL: Show the total number of due cards as a badge on the RemNote app icon.
NOTIFICATIONS.ENABLE_EMAIL_LABEL: Receive notifications directly to your inbox
NOTIFICATIONS.TOGGLE_LABEL: Control which notifications you want to receive directly to your device/inbox

STREAK.TITLE: Streak notifications
STREAK.LABEL: Get daily notifications to keep up your study streak!

INVITE.TITLE: Invite notifications
INVITE.LABEL: Get notified when you have been invited to a group

NEW_LIKE.TITLE: Like notifications
NEW_LIKE.LABEL: Get notified when a document you shared is liked

NEW_FOLLOWER.TITLE: Follower notifications
NEW_FOLLOWER.LABEL: Get notified when someone follows you

DOCUMENT_ADDED_TO_GROUP.TITLE: Document added to group notification
DOCUMENT_ADDED_TO_GROUP.LABEL: Get notified when a document is added to your group

NEW_COMMENT.TITLE: Comment notifications
NEW_COMMENT.LABEL: Get notified when someone comments on your shared document

ARTICLE_VIEWS.TITLE: Document views notifications
ARTICLE_VIEWS.LABEL: Get notified when your shared document starts gaining significant views

TAGS.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search for an existing tag to add it

PROPERTIES_HELP_TEXT.0: Properties describe a tag. For example, for a tag called "Book", add properties named Author, Genre, Reading Status, and more!

TEMPLATES.TEMPLATES_HELP_TEXT: A tag's template is a RemNote document that can be automatically copied to tagged Rems. Add headers, checklists, and more right within your template.
TEMPLATES.AUTO_APPLY_HELP_TEXT: This template will be automatically applied to all rows in its table, or all Rems tagged with the template.

NEW_TAG.TITLE: Create a New {{viewName}} + Tag
NEW_TAG.DESCRIPTION: Start with a blank {{viewName}} with a new tag.

FILTER.NO_PROPERTIES_AVAILABLE: No Properties Are Available; Add a New One!

TABLE_CONFIGURATION.DUPLICATE_VIEW_MESSAGE_COMMON: Duplicate a view to apply a new filter, sort, or more! Content is shared between views of the same source, so you won't end up with any accidental duplicate instances.

CELL_LIST_HEIGHT.CELL_LIST_HEIGHT_TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: Cells can contain multiple bullets! Limit cell height for easier viewing.

LINK_SOURCE.LABEL: Link
LINK_SOURCE.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Paste a link or search for a Reference

UPLOAD_SOURCE.LABEL: Upload
UPLOAD_SOURCE.EMPTY: Drop PDFs, Word docs, PPTs, and <moreLink>more</moreLink> here!

NO_TITLE.SRC: The document you are trying to share doesn't have a title. You need to add one before publishing it.
NO_TITLE.SUBDOCUMENT: One of your subdocuments doesn't have a title. It won't be published until it has one.

NO_CONTENT.SRC: The document you are trying to share looks a bit empty. Please add at least {{minimum}} rems, then try again.
NO_CONTENT.SUBDOCUMENT: One of your subdocuments looks a bit empty. It won't be published until it has {{minimum}} rems.

NEW_COMMENT.BODY_GROUP: sent a chat to your group

NOTIFICATIONS.EMPTY_STATE_MESSAGE: You're all caught up! You'll receive notifications when someone interacts with the content shared on your <profileLink>profile</profileLink>

DOCUMENT.TITLE: Document
DOCUMENT.DESCRIPTION: Organize notes on lectures, sources, or ideas into documents.

QUICK_ADD.TITLE: Quick Add
QUICK_ADD.DESCRIPTION: Capture your ideas on the fly!

TODAYS_DOCUMENT.TITLE: Today's Document
TODAYS_DOCUMENT.DESCRIPTION: Daily Documents are perfect for journaling, to-do lists and more.

TABLE_TAG.TITLE: Tag & Table
TABLE_TAG.DESCRIPTION: Create a tag for use with tables and templates.

UPLOAD_FILE.TITLE: Upload & Annotate File
UPLOAD_FILE.DESCRIPTION: Highlight & reference a PDF, PowerPoint, Word document, or other file.
UPLOAD_FILE.PAYWALL: You have reached your limit for PDF uploads.
